trans-unit.source: Describes an exception that occurred during validation of new or modified values before values are inserted, updated, or deleted by a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 描述新出现的验证过程或修改值之前插入、 更新或删除值的异常<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceValidationException class contains type conversion and property setter exceptions.
trans-unit.target: LinqDataSourceValidationException 类包含类型转换和属性 setter 异常。

trans-unit.source: All of the exceptions that are thrown during validation are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 所有验证过程中引发的异常都包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve each validation exception by iterating through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过循环访问检索每个验证异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: You typically handle exceptions in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting> events.
trans-unit.target: 通常，可处理中的异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>

trans-unit.source: If a validation exception is thrown, the `Exception` property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs> object contains a LinqDataSourceValidationException object.
trans-unit.target: 如果引发验证异常，`Exception`属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs>对象包含 LinqDataSourceValidationException 对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceInsertEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDeleteEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceUpdateEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If no exception is thrown, the `Exception` property contains `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不引发任何异常，`Exception`属性包含`null`。

trans-unit.source: To handle validation exceptions, create a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要处理验证异常，创建的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>

trans-unit.source: In the event handler, check whether the `Exception` property of the event argument class contains a value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序中，检查是否`Exception`的事件参数类的属性包含的值以外`null`。

trans-unit.source: If the `Exception` property is not null, one or more validation exceptions were thrown and you can retrieve each validation exception in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Exception`属性不为 null，引发了一个或多个验证异常，你可以检索在每个验证异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: A validation exception can occur if a value does not match the type of the property.
trans-unit.target: 如果值与属性的类型不匹配，则会发生验证异常。

trans-unit.source: For example, trying to update an integer property by using non-numeric characters causes a validation exception.
trans-unit.target: 例如，尝试使用非数字字符来更新是整数属性会导致验证异常。

trans-unit.source: A LINQ to SQL class can also contain customized validation criteria that make sure that the property contains a value that is within an expected range or pattern.
trans-unit.target: LINQ to SQL 类还可以包含自定义的验证条件，以确保该属性包含一个值，在预期的范围或模式内。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException"></xref> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException"></xref>使用系统提供的描述错误的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The system-supplied message that describes the error takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的系统提供的消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|A system-supplied localized description.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|系统提供的一个本地化的描述。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException"></xref> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException"></xref>使用指定的描述错误的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string specified in `message`.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|中指定的错误消息字符串`message`。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object that is transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: Context information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException"></xref> class with a specified message that describes the error, and a collection of references to inner exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException"></xref>使用指定的消息描述错误，以及对内部异常的引用的集合类。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: The collection of validation exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 验证异常的集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: You typically will not use this constructor because validation exceptions are stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A> property, not the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通常不使用此构造函数，因为验证异常存储在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A>属性，不<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceValidationException.InnerExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the exception and adds it to the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取有关异常的信息，并将其添加到<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The GetObjectData method adds information about the exception to the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> object that is targeted for serialization.
trans-unit.target: GetObjectData 方法将添加到异常有关的信息<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>针对于序列化的对象。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> that is transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化期间重建异常从<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>通过流传输。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data for the exception that is being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 承载所引发的异常的序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: Context information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets one or more exceptions that occurred when new or modified data was being validated.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个或多个验证新的或修改数据时发生的异常。

trans-unit.source: The InnerExceptions collection contains all the validation exceptions that were thrown during data validation before an update, insert, or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 集合包含已更新之前, 的数据验证过程中引发的所有验证异常 InnerExceptions 插入或删除操作。

trans-unit.source: A validation exception can occur if a value does not match the type of the property.
trans-unit.target: 如果值与属性的类型不匹配，则会发生验证异常。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you try to update an integer property by using non-numeric characters, a validation exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你尝试使用非数字字符更新是整数属性，将引发验证异常。

trans-unit.source: A LINQ to SQL class can also contain customized validation criteria that make sure that the property contains a value that is within an expected range or pattern.
trans-unit.target: LINQ to SQL 类还可以包含自定义的验证条件，以确保该属性包含一个值，在预期的范围或模式内。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含异常的集合。
